texts.name: Abok
texts.biography: Abok is an oppressed young noblewoman, one of the four founders of the kingdom Wild Walley. Her family has been ravaged by years of war and desperately needs a peaceful environment to regain their strength. To protect her family, after years of hard work, she has learned to tame fireflies to defend herself from outside enemies.

specialty.description: Increases Speed of any Fireflies, Firefly Stalkers or Firefly Hunters by 1 and their Attack and Defense skills by 5% for every 2 levels (rounded up)
specialty.name: Fireflies
